Message.Title: Less and less buy from AMZN because more states start collecting tax
Message.Msg: AMZN July sales only had 0.1% growth, which is 1/5 of over all national growth. Go figure. AMZN retail business is in big trouble.

Topic.Title: Less and less buy from AMZN because more states start collecting tax

Message.Msg: Much as I dislike this scam, the retail sales report is a proxy for Amazon's revenue growth but not Amazon's revenue growth. It did slow down from almost 9% to almost nothing, so it is likely that Amazon also witnessing a slowdown (and what a majestic implosion it will be if sales ever cease to grow and working capital starts using cash rather than providing cash...)

Topic.Title: Syb, which is the better short--NFLX or AMZN or CMG

Message.Msg: CMG in my observation. A CMG is near my house. I saw very few people dining there but their earnings always tops estimate. I suspect eventually some accountings fraud will come out. NFLX and AMZN are real things. They have real customers. Stupid customers but real. They don't mind paying more or seeking the best deals. Don't short AMZN or NFLX. I see them keep growing or at least won't die overnight, unlike CMG.
